d said.

out something that none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and =
waved to them. The People's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swam=
p.

ber.

d.

bomber drug Drazom out of the water and ushered him to come along while he =
walked with his comrades.

                                Dracona was gett=
ing furious, and so was Gangon.

                                "Sorry Gan=
gon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show up anyway." Draco=
na said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

                          =
      "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

roup members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and Artist all entered the =

alled out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

                  "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and=
 it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! How come we never noticed=
 this room before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. Strongho=
ld and Blender followed.

                                "Wait up guys!" A=
rrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa sealed the door magnetica=
lly upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were locked inside the room t=
o sort out their problems. There was alot of banging, but it eventually sto=
pped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and sat down at a table =
to play cards with Dracona.

                                "Oh, man! Not =
even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold sa=
id.

                                "What are we going to do? Nothing to s=
moke!" Blender said.

                                "I have more needs th=
an all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!" S=
tranato yelled.

                                "How come we can't all get=
 along! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at hi=
m like he was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

            =
                    "You see? That's why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand u=
p against Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck ye=
lled.

                                "Yeah, and nobody is getting out of =
here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

                    =

rted pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in cracks in t=
he wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water in this room. Train=
 Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold an=
d Blender joined them before long.

                                "Say, y=
ou guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

      =

u can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and s=
its with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.
